jaken herman 🚀 Software Engineer at NASA 🛰️ I'm a full-stack software engineer specializing in the ASP.NET framework in both Visual Basic and C# ‎‍💻. I also work on Mobile Application development using both the Xamarin.Forms framework and Apache Cordova framework depending on the project 📱. I'm well-versed in JavaScript and many of it's popular libraries and frameworks. In my free time, I like to play golf ⛳ and brew beer 🍺. I am married to an amazing woman who also works at NASA in Mission Control as a flight controller. We have 2 dogs 🐶, 4 cats 🐱, and lots of great friends.
